programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: Oscar-winning comedy drama starring Tom Hanks, Gary Sinise and Robin Wright. Forrest Gump wasn't born with a lot of smarts, but he is encouraged by his mother to realise his full potential. He attends college on a sports scholarship, meeting President Kennedy in the process, joins the army and is sent to Vietnam. programme.desc: Crime caper starring Sandra Bullock, Cate Blanchett and Anne Hathaway. They immediately set about co-ordinating an audacious new heist: stealing a $150 million necklace from the actress wearing it at New York's Met Gala. programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Romance, Children's ║ 2004 ║ PG
programme.desc: Sequel to the hit animated fantasy, featuring the voices of Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy and Cameron Diaz. On returning from their honeymoon, Shrek and Princess Fiona are invited to stay with her parents in the kingdom of Far Far Away. But King Harold is less than enchanted by his new son-in-law, and the Fairy Godmother has good reason to want the ogre out of Fiona's life. Cue assassin-for hire Puss-in-Boots.. programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. Eventually the attacks begin, catching Minister of Defence Moshe Dayan off guard. Meir refuses to accept his resignation and a weakened Dayan leads the Israeli response, which requires Meir to request air support from US Secretary of State, Henry Kissinger. programme.desc: Comedy, inspired by the 1970s TV series, starring Shelley Long and Gary Cole. Los Angeles in 1995: the community is crumbling and the crime rate is spiralling out of control. programme.title: Madame Web
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2024 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Thirty years after her scientist mother died whilst giving birth in the Peruvian Amazon, New York paramedic Cassandra 'Cassie' Webb saves lives without forming any emotional attachments besides her level-headed work partner, Ben. This magical clairvoyance pinpoints Ezekiel Sims before he attempts to kill three young women, Julia Cornwall, Mattie Franklin and Anya Corazon. programme.title: Madame Web
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2024 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Thirty years after her scientist mother died whilst giving birth in the Peruvian Amazon, New York paramedic Cassandra 'Cassie' Webb saves lives without forming any emotional attachments besides her level-headed work partner, Ben. This magical clairvoyance pinpoints Ezekiel Sims before he attempts to kill three young women, Julia Cornwall, Mattie Franklin and Anya Corazon. programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-August 2024
programme.desc: Going to the cinema isn’t the cheap date it used to be, so be sure to make the most of these offers to watch a movie for less. Here are the best ways to get cheap cinema tickets this month.

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: Action fantasy starring Christian Bale. When the wealthy parents of young Bruce Wayne are killed in front of him during a street robbery, the traumatised youth becomes bitter and eaten up with a desire for revenge. After a period in the Far East where he learns disciplined fighting skills and the power to channel his rage from the enigmatic Henri Ducard, the now adult Wayne returns to a Gotham City riddled with corruption and embarks on a crusade to cleanse the metropolis of crime under the guise of "the Batman" Christopher Nolan - Director, Christopher Nolan - Director Christian Bale - Bruce Wayne / Batman Michael Caine - Alfred the butler Liam Neeson - Henri Ducard Katie Holmes - Rachel Dawes Gary Oldman - Detective Sergeant James Gordon Cillian Murphy - Dr Jonathan Crane / Scarecrow Tom Wilkinson - Carmine Falcone Rutger Hauer - Richard Earle Ken Watanabe - Ra's al Ghul Morgan Freeman - Lucius Fox Colin McFarlane - Commissioner Loeb Alexandra Bastedo - Mrs Delane Linus Roache - Dr Thomas Wayne Mark Boone Junior - Flass Sara Stewart - Martha Wayne Richard Brake - Joe Chill Christian Bale - Bruce Wayne / Batman Michael Caine - Alfred the butler Liam Neeson - Henri Ducard Katie Holmes - Rachel Dawes Gary Oldman - Detective Sergeant James Gordon Cillian Murphy - Dr Jonathan Crane / Scarecrow Tom Wilkinson - Carmine Falcone Rutger Hauer - Richard Earle Ken Watanabe - Ra's al Ghul Morgan Freeman - Lucius Fox Colin McFarlane - Commissioner Loeb Alexandra Bastedo - Mrs Delane Linus Roache - Dr Thomas Wayne Mark Boone Junior - Flass Sara Stewart - Martha Wayne Richard Brake - Joe Chill.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2024 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Thirty years after her scientist mother died whilst giving birth in the Peruvian Amazon, New York paramedic Cassandra 'Cassie' Webb saves lives without forming any emotional attachments besides her level-headed work partner, Ben. A routine call-out almost ends in tragedy and Cassie experiences disorienting visions which suggest she is predisposed to glimpse the future and subtly alter the course of history through her actions. This magical clairvoyance pinpoints Ezekiel Sims before he attempts to kill three young women, Julia Cornwall, Mattie Franklin and Anya Corazon. programme.desc: Shahid Kapoor, Amrita Rao.

programme.title: Ghoomer

programme.title: Bareily Ki Barfi

programme.title: Heer Ranjha
programme.desc: Jal Mistry won the 'Best Cinematography - Color' award at the Filmfare Awards 1971.

programme.title: Kites

programme.title: Jism
programme.desc: (2003) Kabir (John Abraham) loves a married lady named Sonia (Bipasha) who instigates him to kill her husband. Kabir agrees, unaware that Sonia has other plans up her sleeve.

programme.title: Jeete Hai Shaan Se
programme.desc: (1988) A film about three close friends. Two of them end up becoming enemies after some truths are revealed. Starring Mithun Chakraborty, Sanjay Dutt and Govinda.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Some of the best soundtracks of Bollywood uncut.

programme.title: Malamaal Weekly
programme.desc: Lilaram sells lottery tickets and one customer dies of shock upon finding out that he has won a jackpot. Now, Lilaram wants all the money, and so does everyone around him.

programme.title: Kisna - The Warrior Poet
programme.desc: (2005) Kisna (Vivek Oberoi) pledges to take Catherine, his childhood friend back to England when freedom fighters vow to kill her. This is the story of their love and journey.

programme.title: Bhawani Junction
programme.desc: Police officer Ram's friend Bhavani promises to help him find the culprits who raped his wife. However, things turn ugly between them when Ram learns the offender is Bhavani's son. (1985).

programme.title: Aamne Saamne
programme.desc: Acquitted for killing his wife, a man relocates and remarries another wealthy woman, and then becomes a suspect when attempts are made to kill her also.

programme.title: Satyagraha

programme.title: Sherdil: The Pilibhit Saga
programme.desc: (Movie@6) Inspired by the real events that took place in the Pilibhit Tiger Reserve where people would leave their elderly family members for tigers to prey on, & then claim compensation.

programme.title: Trimurti
programme.desc: (1965) A drama about two brothers. The eldest brother is a good man while the second one has gone astray. Fate compels the youngest brother, Romi (Shahrukh Khan), to choose between good and bad.

programme.title: WAQT: Race Against Time
programme.desc: Shefali Shah won Best Supporting Actress in Stardust Awards, India 2006.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Some of the best soundtracks of Bollywood uncut.

programme.title: Chintu Ka Birthday
programme.desc: This film is set during the US invasion of Iraq where amidst all the danger, an Indian family awaiting its return to India struggles to celebrate the birthday of its youngest member.

programme.title: Sniff
programme.desc: (2017) Sniff is the story of Sunny Gill (Khushmeet Gill) who cannot smell. But a freak accident gives Sunny the most refined sense of smell ever.

programme.title: Bewafai
programme.desc: 1985 release about Asha (Tina Munim) who has a crush on Ashok (Rajesh Khanna) and can't stand his relationship with Renu (Padmini Kolhapure). She then plans to teach Renu a lesson.

programme.title: Amir Garib
programme.desc: Moni lives a dual life, that of a musician and the other as a thief whose motive is to help the needy and poor. He falls in love with Soni but later finds out that she is not who she claims to be.

programme.title: Biwi Ho To Aisi

programme.title: Dosti - Friends Forever
programme.desc: (Movie @6) Karan, a wealthy young man, is saved by Raj, a poor guy, from a near-death accident, which gives rise to their unending tale of friendship and brotherhood. (2005).

programme.title: Tumbbad
programme.desc: The film was praised globally and won several awards like best cinematographer, best production designer, best special effects, best film, and best feature film.

programme.title: Chhoriya Chhoron Se Kam Nahi Hoti

programme.title: Milenge Milenge
programme.desc: Hoping that destiny will reunite them, a couple, on the verge of getting married, attempt to locate each other. Starring Shahid Kapoor and Kareena Kapoor.

programme.title: Babumoshai Bandookbaaz
programme.desc: The film is a quirky ride of a reputed contract killer, Babu, and revolves around love, friendship, rivalries, and revenge.

programme.title: Yaara
programme.desc: The movie is a crime saga about two friends who once ruled the smuggling business and are now struggling to start life afresh.

programme.title: Hum Kisi Se Kum Nahin
programme.desc: A 1977 romantic tale about Kajal's (Kajal Kiran) search for her childhood friend Sanjay (Tariq) to marry him! Will destiny bring them together? R. D. Burman shines again.

programme.title: Zamane Ko Dikhana Hai
programme.desc: Kanchan (Padmini Kolhapure) falls for Ravi (Rishi Kapoor), but is unaware that he's also the son of the man who had killed her sister and brother-in-law. A 1981 love story.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2024 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Thirty years after her scientist mother died whilst giving birth in the Peruvian Amazon, New York paramedic Cassandra 'Cassie' Webb saves lives without forming any emotional attachments besides her level-headed work partner, Ben. This magical clairvoyance pinpoints Ezekiel Sims before he attempts to kill three young women, Julia Cornwall, Mattie Franklin and Anya Corazon. programme.title: Madame Web
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2024 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Thirty years after her scientist mother died whilst giving birth in the Peruvian Amazon, New York paramedic Cassandra 'Cassie' Webb saves lives without forming any emotional attachments besides her level-headed work partner, Ben. programme.title: Night Swim
programme.desc: Forced into early retirement by a degenerative illness, former baseball player Ray Waller moves into a new house with his wife and two children. He hopes that the backyard swimming pool will be fun for the kids and provide physical therapy for himself. However, a dark secret from the home's past soon unleashes a malevolent force that drags the family into the depths of inescapable terror. programme.desc: The fourth round of the AIG Women's Open, as the home of golf sets the scene for the final women's Major of the season. A year ago, Lilia Vu claimed victory at Walton Heath. (25.08).

programme.title: British Masters 2019 Highlights
programme.desc: Day four of the British Masters hosted by Tommy Fleetwood from Hillside Golf Club in Southport. England's Matt Wallace and Sweden's Marcus Kinhult lead on 14 under heading into today.

programme.title: British Masters 2020 Highlights
programme.desc: The fourth day of the Betfred British Masters from Close House. Marcus Kinhult was the winner on this day last year.

programme.title: British Masters 2020 Highlights
programme.desc: The fourth day of the Betfred British Masters from Close House. Marcus Kinhult was the winner on this day last year.

programme.title: PGA Tour Playoffs Film 2019
programme.desc: The Official Film of the 2019 FedEx Cup play-offs, as the 2018-19 PGA Tour season drew to a close with a dramatic final series of events.

programme.title: Legends Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: The Legends Tour season continued with the Zambia Legends Championship, staged at Bonanza Golf Club in Lusaka. 2005 US Open winner Michael Campbell teed it up here.

programme.title: Women's Open Golf Final Round Hlts
programme.desc: The fourth round of the AIG Women's Open, as the home of golf sets the scene for the final women's Major of the season. A year ago, Lilia Vu claimed victory at Walton Heath. (25.08).

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the BMW Championship, held Castle Pines Golf Club. This is the second event of the FedEx Cup Playoffs and features a progressive cut as 50 stars compete.

programme.desc: The PGA Tour Champions season rolls on with the Ally Challenge, taking place at Warwick Hills Golf and Country Club. Three-time Major champion Vijay Singh was the previous winner.

programme.title: PGA Tour: The Cut
programme.desc: A look behind the scenes of the PGA Tour. Follow the world's best players as they prepare for the big events in 2024.

programme.desc: The European Challenge Tour took to Vierumaki for the Finnish Challenge, held at Vierumaki Resort in Finland. On home soil, Lauri Ruuska's maiden win came at this event a year ago.

programme.title: PGA Tour Champions Learning Cen
programme.desc: From instruction tips for your game, to fitness advice and lifestyle lessons, hear from the best on the circuit in PGA Tour Champions Learning Centre.

programme.title: WTA Final: Cincinnati
programme.desc: Jessica Pegula, a champion in Canada a week ago, sets out to extend Aryna Sabalenka's six-month title drought as the pair collide in the Cincinnati Open final. (19.08).

programme.title: ATP Final: Cincinnati
programme.desc: Jannik Sinner faces Frances Tiafoe in the American's first ATP Masters 1000 final, as the fan favourite attempts to topple the Italian world number one at the Cincinnati Open. (19.08).

programme.desc: A wild-card matchup from the 2023 NFL playoffs, as the reigning Super Bowl champions Kansas City host the Miami Dolphins who are searching for their first postseason win since 2000. (13.01).
